string.value: Riel, Rael and Roel starts betting on who will be offered to King Clang. The winner gets to be the sacrifice! How can I help these girls get to their senses? Let's meet with #bRael#k.

Shy Rael says her dare was to take out #r50 Torties#k. She doesn't look like a person who'd participate in this kind of bet. Looks can be deceiving. Rael hesitates to ask me to help, but I'd better get this over with and take out those Torties. Then I'll talk about how ridiculous this bet is.\n\n#o4130101# #r#a21601##k
Hey... you... are you the adventurer who will be judging us? Glad to meet you. Thank you for all this trouble. I'm not confident in winning. What? You... you're asking why I'm not?
Well... I'm supposed to defeat Torties, right? How can a girl like me get even close to them? Of course, an adventurer like you would defeat them blindfolded. I'm just an ordinary girl.
Even so... cowardly and fainthearted I am, but I don't... I don't want to lose this bet. Adventurer... I'm sorry to ask you this, but... would it be possible for you to help me a little bit?
Oh? Ah... you really will help me? Really? I can't believe it! How can I ever thank you enough? Please take out #r50 Torties#k for me. I'll be waiting for you here.
Oh... I thought so. Oh well... I can't keep an adventurer like yourself busy with an ordinary girl like me.
Have you defeated all 50 Torties? Are you hurt anywhere? If not, then good... how can I ever thank you enough?
What? This bet... Give this bet up? Why are you saying this to me? You've already helped me through it! I will not take your help for granted, and will win this bet.
You haven't defeated #r50 Torties#k yet? I will lose if I'm late...
